statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.Name) as RowNo , BB.ID , BB.CreatedOn , BB.CreatedBy , BB.CreatedByName , BB.UpdatedOn , BB.UpdatedBy , BB.UpdatedByName
, AA.SiteID as SiteID , AA.CategoryID as CategoryID , AA.Gender as Gender , AA.ID as ScrapSizeID , BB.SmapsSizeID as SmapsSizeID
, DD.Name as CategoryName , M1.Name as GenderName , AA.Name as ScrapSizeName , CC.text as SmapsSizeName
FROM IKScrap.dbo.TScrapSize AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TScrapSizeToSmaps BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ID = BB.ScrapSizeID LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TSmapsSize CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON BB.SmapsSizeID = CC.ID LEFT JOIN IKScrap.dbo.TScrapCategory DD WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.CategoryID = DD.ID LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.Gender = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'Gender' WHERE AA.SiteID = #SiteID#
AND BB.SmapsSizeID IS NOT NULL
AND BB.SmapsSizeID IS NULL
AND ( AA.Name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' OR CC.text LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TScrapSizeToSmaps WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ID = #ID#
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TScrapSizeToSmaps WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ScrapSizeID = #ScrapSizeID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TScrapSizeToSmaps ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, ScrapSizeID, SmapsSizeID ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #ScrapSizeID#, #SmapsSizeID# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE IKScrap.dbo.TScrapSizeToSmaps SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, ScrapSizeID = #ScrapSizeID# , SmapsSizeID = #SmapsSizeID# WHERE ID = #ID#
